An invaluable item for makeup artists, the DS3 Disposable Mascara Wands allow you to hygienically apply your favourite mascara to multiple people. A classic, tapered spiral design with firm, synthetic bristles apply mascara evenly to lashes, lifting and separating them as you brush it through.

Featuring perfectly spaced, gold plated metal teeth, Folding Lash Comb glides through lashes to remove excess mascara whilst the extremely tapered design leaves lashes looking thicker and longer without any clumps.

product_description:
A pack of disposable eyeliner brushes.
With 25 in a pack, DS5 Disposable Eyeliner Wands are perfect for both personal and professional use. With a delicate, fine tip and long, thin handle, create a range of precision eyeliner looks with maximum control and hygiene.
